attributes.review: This petty cheese puff off a “president”’s app is the worst thing ever invented. Just looking at it makes my eyes melt. It is pointless. He does nothing and it is pathetic. I hate this app. Only downloaded it to leave a bad review cuz I want this app gone and I saw a tik tok video saying to do this. Tik Tok get 5 stars any day. This??? This would get negative five if I could.
attributes.title: This is the worst app

attributes.review: IT COMPLETELY DESTROYES MY OHOEN SO NOW I CANT EVEN PLAY ANYTHING OR DO ANYTHING FOR MORE THAN FIVE MINUTES CUZ MY PHONE RESTARTS jk just for tik tok
attributes.title: Worst App

attributes.review: Ok so let’s start off with the fact that ain’t nobody like oranges. I downloaded this app then IMMEDIATELY it asked to use up a WHOLE BUNCH of my storage space😰 this is app is so horrible. PERIOD. It’s even WORSE than drinking orange 🍊 juice AFTER brushing your teeth 🦷. I hope that whoever downloads this app and actually likes it gets their big toe stubbed on EVERY SINGLE WOODEN SURFACE FOR THE REST OF THEIR LIFE. I hope that every single food order you ever get is wrong. I hope that all your food gets burnt. THIS APP ALSO THREATENED TO HACK MY PHONE AND LEAK ALL OF MY CONTACT INFO. WARNING ⚠️ DONT GET THIS APP. It’s DANGEROUS 💊
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP IT SUCKSSSS

attributes.review: This app gave my phone a bunch of issues and now my phone won’t stop crashing and it’s turning itself off every 5 minutes from the app >:(
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: Once upon a time I was walking my phrog🐸 down the street. Then he jumped up to me and told me to go download this app so I did And here we are now. Have a wonderful day and don’t forget to walk your phrog🐸)^o^(
attributes.title: Phrog

attributes.review: this doesn't work at alll think it was a waste of money I tryed it so many times NOTHING shacking my head … im so mad… I really thought it wud work but notttt< idk if u want u can buy it .mayb u have luck but I wudnt bye another EVER AGAIN
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app because trump had my heart. The whole time it was downloading I was jumping around with such excitement. Bait the second it finished  downloading my phone shut down. I was really confused but assumed I just ran low on battery or something. When I managed to turn it back on my phone half my apps were missing, all my unread emails had been opened and half were deleted, same thing with all my texts. I also had tons of my pictures deleted. This app made me reconsider my support for our president. I don’t know what he did or what his team did to cause this but I feel truly invaded and hurt by it. Please do not get this unless you are willing to have your phone’s privacy invaded.
attributes.title: trump supporters do not buy

attributes.review: 0/10 would not recommend downloading. Just no❤️
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I made one donation and the next day I had 500 dollars taken from my account and the name of my statement was the trump campaign!! There system is fraudulent!!!! I had to call my grandson to help me get it figured out it took us A WEEK to get it resolved!!!!!
attributes.title: Stole my banking information

attributes.review: I download this app to support my favorite president but when I opened the app it was filled with gæ pœrn. I was very furious and disappointed with my fellow american president😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: Dont get this app plzz very bad app
